sentences.en: As long as net emissions are reduced, it is immaterial who reduces them.
sentences.cn: 只要最后的排放量减少了就行, 至于谁减少了则无关紧要.

sentences.en: If you sign a document, it is wholly immaterial whether you have read it carefully or not.
sentences.cn: 文件一经签署，是否仔细阅读过文件就完全无关紧要了。

sentences.en: In most cases it is considered immaterial.
sentences.cn: 在大多数情况下它是无足轻重的.

sentences.en: It is immaterial ( to me ) whether he stays or leaves.
sentences.cn: 他的去留 ( 对我 ) 无所谓.

sentences.en: It is quite immaterial to me.
Since a dummy index just indicates summation, it is immaterial which symbol is used.
sentences.cn: 由于哑指标只是表明求和, 所以它使用什么符号是无关重要的.
对我来说那根本无足轻重.

sentences.en: The body is material but the soul is immaterial.
sentences.cn: 身体是物质的,但灵魂是无形的.

sentences.en: The geographical position of the cut is immaterial, only its direction is important.
sentences.cn: 与剖面的地理位置无关, 只有剖面方向是重要的.

sentences.en: The sum of money is quite immaterial to him.
The total - head tubes should be cut off square, and their length is immaterial.
sentences.cn: 总压管端应加工平整, 至于它们的长度则无关紧要.
这事何时发生是无关紧要的.

sentences.en: Whether the nonuniform pulse density is immaterial , of course, depends on the specific application.
sentences.cn: 脉冲密度的不均匀性是否有害, 应由具体应用决定.

sentences.en: Whether we like him or not is immaterial.
sentences.cn: 我们是否喜欢他无关紧要。

words.tran_cn: 非物质的；无形的；不重要的；非实质的

trans.tran_cn: 不重要的，非实质的，非物质的，无形的
trans.tran_en: not having a physical body or form
